name: Love ritual
description: Visit a beautiful fantasy city as an occult scientist where a forbidden ritual was performed. Unravel the mystery with your detective skills as the plot thickens around you, and all while two handsome advocates vie for your attention and your heart.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core 2Duo  @ 2.13GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA 600 Series, AMD 7000 Series Storage: 2000 MB available space
